assumptions.label: Accessory Declaration Status
assumptions.description: When the policy document does not clearly indicate whether aftermarket accessories were declared, this assumption determines the default treatment

alternatives.label: Assume Not Declared
alternatives.description: Treat accessory as not declared on policy - conservative approach that excludes accessory from coverage

alternatives.label: Assume Declared
alternatives.description: Treat accessory as declared on policy - customer-favorable approach that includes accessory in coverage

assumptions.label: Driver Identity Confirmation
assumptions.description: When the identity of the driver at the time of incident cannot be confirmed from available documentation

alternatives.label: Assume Policyholder Was Driving
alternatives.description: Assume the policyholder was the driver at the time of the incident

alternatives.label: Assume Authorized Driver
alternatives.description: Assume an authorized driver listed on the policy was driving

alternatives.label: Require Confirmation
alternatives.description: Request additional documentation to confirm driver identity before proceeding

assumptions.label: Repair Quality Standard
assumptions.description: When the claim does not specify the expected repair quality standard

alternatives.label: Assume OEM Parts Required
alternatives.description: Use original equipment manufacturer parts for repairs

alternatives.label: Allow Equivalent Parts
alternatives.description: Allow use of equivalent quality aftermarket parts
